Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- District 1, City of New Iberia
Council Member -- District 3, City of New Iberia
Council Member -- District 5, City of New Iberia
PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Iberia Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: City of New Iberia -- 2.96 Mills - Mayor & CC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
City of New Iberia Proposition 
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Authority to renew a 10 year 2.96 mills tax for an additional 10 years for maintaining and operating public parks and recreational facilities in said City.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of New Iberia, State of Louisiana (the "City") renew a special tax of two and ninety-six hundredths (2.96) mills on all of the property subject to taxation in said City for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, such tax expected on average to generate $465,150 per year, for the purpose of maintaining and operating public parks and recreational facilities in said City?
